4303220.name: Noodle Hustle
4303220.description:
Noodle Hustle is a first-person cooking simulation, with multiple ending story.

Gameplay Loop

The gameplay loop in this game is simple, you buy the necessary ingredient from the store, and cook the noodle according to the customer's order, take payment, but make sure the order is correct otherwise, customer will ask for a compensation.

Story

You only live with your grandma, when suddenly something bad happen. She was rushed to hospital, and doctor said, surgery need to be done ASAP or something bad happen, then they give you the bills. You have to manage to get the money quickly, you have 5 days.

You don't have job, and you can't afford to apply for a high paid job considering you were dropped out of school due to financial issue.

Luckily, your neighbor has unused noodle cart that you can use, while selling noodle doesn't require too much skill to learn, this is the only viable option you have, it's probably wont enough to pay the bills, but who knows? anything could happen.
4303220.supported_languages: 英语, 印度尼西亚语
